statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 14 \\ 2 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 36 \\ -34 \\ -2 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 14 \\ 2 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 36 \\ -34 \\ -2 \\ -13 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
